login.title: Ngena ukuze uqhubeke

toasts.ssoNotConfigured: I-SSO yeShishini ayimiselwanga kule domain. Nceda unxibelelane nomphathi wakho we-IT okanye usebenzise enye indlela yokungena.

login.ssoDescription: Kwimibutho, iiyunivesithi, kunye nezikolo ezisebenzisa i-SSO
login.enterWorkEmail: Faka i-imeyile yakho yasemsebenzini okanye yesikolo
login.enterWorkEmailDescription: Faka idilesi yakho ye-imeyile yasemsebenzini okanye yesikolo. Siza kukuthumela ngokuzenzekelayo kwiphepha lokungena lombutho wakho.
login.ssoProvidersInfo: Isebenza neMicrosoft Azure AD, iOkta, iGoogle Workspace, kunye nabanye ababoneleli beenkcukacha zobunikazi abasetyenziswa ziinkampani, iiyunivesithi kunye nezikolo.
login.oneAccountForAll: Iakhawunti enye yohlalutyo lomxholo, ucwangciso, nokunye.

toasts.checkEmail: Jonga i-imeyile yakho ukuze ubone ikhonkco lokuseta kwakhona igama lokugqitha

toasts.loginNow: Ngoku ungangena ngemvume ngephasiwedi yakho entsha

gdpr.consentDataProcessing: Ndiyavuma ukuba idatha yam yobuqu icutshungulwe ukuze kulawulwe iakhawunti kwaye kunikezelwe iinkonzo
gdpr.marketingConsent: Ndifuna ukufumana uhlaziyo lwemveliso kunye nonxibelelwano lokuthengisa (ukhetho)

contentGeneration.title: Ukuveliswa komxholo we-AI
contentGeneration.subtitle: Yenza umxholo ngoko nangoko, cwangcisa ukwenziwa ngokuzenzekelayo, okanye ujonge imbali yakho.
contentGeneration.generatePostSubtitle: Yenza umxholo oxhaswa yi-AI ngoko nangoko
contentGeneration.tip: Icebiso: Hlola kwaye wenze ngokwezifiso umxholo owenziweyo ukuze uhambelane nelizwi lophawu lwakho. Ungayihlela ngakumbi kwi-Content Moderation.
contentGeneration.promotionalDisclosure: Ukudalulwa kuya kongezwa ukuze kuthotyelwe izikhokelo zentengiso
contentGeneration.noScheduled: Akukho zicelo zicwangcisiweyo okwangoku. Yenza esinye esingentla!
contentGeneration.noHistory: Akukho mxholo uvelisiweyo okwangoku. Qala ukudala!

suggestions.insights: Thumela malunga nolwazi okanye iindlela zoshishino
suggestions.culture: Thumela malunga nenkcubeko kunye neempawu zenkampani

toasts.contentGeneratedPosted: Umxholo uza kuveliswa uze uthunyelwe ngokuzenzekelayo

errors.generationFailed: Ukuveliswa komxholo akuphumelelanga. Nceda uzame kwakhona.
errors.selectPlatformAutoPost: Nceda ukhethe ubuncinane iqonga elinye lokuthumela ngokuzenzekelayo

contentGeneration.selectPlatformsOptimize: Khetha amaqonga okuphucula uhlalutyo lomxholo kunye nokunyanzelisa imida yabalinganiswa

contentModeration.editingPostDesc: Xa ugcina, oku kuya kuhlaziya iposi yembali - kungekhona entsha
contentModeration.originalReplaced: Umxholo wokuqala utshintshwe yinguqulelo ebhalwe ngokutsha
contentModeration.clearConfirm: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukususa lo mxholo ngaphandle kokugcina?
contentModeration.createYourFirst: Yenza iposi yakho yokuqala ukuze uyibone apha

posts.title: Zonke izithuba
posts.subtitle: Lawula umxholo wakho kuwo onke amaqonga

strategicProfiles.pageDescription: Yenza iiprofayili zebhrendi ezineziseko zolwazi kwaye uzidibanise neeakhawunti zoluntu
strategicProfiles.alertDescription: Iprofayili nganye inolwazi olwahlukileyo, isitayile sokubhala, kunye namagama angundoqo e-SEO. Layisha amaxwebhu ukuze wakhe isiseko solwazi esikhokela ukuveliswa komxholo we-AI. Qhagamshelanisa iiakhawunti zentlalo ukuze upapashe ngokuthe ngqo kumxholo ngamnye weprofayili.
strategicProfiles.defaultProfileDesc: Iprofayili yakho ephambili idibene nezicwangciso zeakhawunti
strategicProfiles.contentLanguageHelper: Ulwimi lomxholo owenziwe yi-AI (engenanto = sebenzisa okungagqibekanga kwiSetingi)
strategicProfiles.seoKeywordsHelper: Yongeza amagama angundoqo ukuze ulungiselele umxholo wokukhangela
strategicProfiles.supportedFormats: Ixhaswa: I-PDF, i-Word, i-Excel, i-PowerPoint, i-Text, i-Markdown, i-CSV
strategicProfiles.profileNamePlaceholder: umz., Uphawu lokuThengisa, iBlog yoBuchule, uBuqu

bonusMetadata.title: Useto lweProfayili oluPhambili
bonusMetadata.targetAudiencePlaceholder: Chaza abaphulaphuli bakho ekujoliswe kubo (umz., iingcali zentengiso ezineminyaka engama-25-45 ubudala ezinomdla kwitekhnoloji)
bonusMetadata.targetAudienceHelper: Inceda i-AI ukuba ilungelelanise ithoni kunye nomxholo kubaphulaphuli bakho abathile

strategicProfiles.selectSocialAccount: Khetha iakhawunti yoluntu oza kuqhagamshelana nayo
strategicProfiles.noSocialAccounts: Akukho akhawunti zoluntu ezifunyenweyo. Qhagamshela iiakhawunti kwi

toasts.addedKeywords: Amagama angundoqo ongezelelweyo asekelwe kwiprofayili yakho

strategicProfiles.confirmDeleteProfile: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukucima le phrofayili? Oku kuya kususa onke amaxwebhu olwazi alayishiweyo.
strategicProfiles.confirmDeleteDoc: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukucima olu xwebhu?

aiKnowledgeExtractor.title: I-AI Knowledge Extractor
aiKnowledgeExtractor.dropHint: Lahla isikhokelo sophawu, ilogo, okanye uxwebhu lomgaqo-nkqubo

reviewModal.summaryHint: Esi sishwankathelo siza kongezwa kwisiseko solwazi seprofayili yakho.

toasts.invalidFileTypeDesc: Nceda ulayishe ifayile yePDF, DOCX, TXT, MD, PNG, JPG, okanye WEBP.

settings.title: Useto

settings.changePasswordHelp: Apha ungabeka igama lakho eligqithisiweyo elitsha
settings.defaultHomepageHelp: Eli phepha liza kuvulwa xa ungena

teamPage.title: Ulawulo lweQela
teamPage.subtitle: Lawula amalungu eqela lakho kunye neemvume zawo
teamPage.inviteFirst: Mema ilungu leqela lakho lokuqala ukuba liqalise

inviteModal.title: Mema ilungu leQela
inviteModal.emailHelper: Ilungu liza kufumana i-imeyile enekhonkco lesimemo

roles.creator: Umdali
roles.creatorDesc: Unokwenza kwaye uhlele umxholo, awungenise ukuze uvunywe
roles.adminOption: Ulawulo - Ukufikelela okupheleleyo kuquka ulawulo lweqela

toasts.emailRequiredDesc: Nceda ufake idilesi ye-imeyile yelungu leqela.

teamPage.confirmRemove: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukususa u-{{name}} kwiqela?

roles.title: Ulawulo lweMisebenzi
roles.subtitle: Yenza kwaye ulawule iindima ezenziwe ngokwezifiso ngeemvume ezihlanganisiweyo
roles.noRoles: Akukho zindima ezenziwe ngokwezifiso okwangoku. Yenza enye ukuze uqalise.

createModal.title: Yenza Indima Entsha
createModal.permissionsHint: Khetha iimvume ekufuneka zibe nazo le ndima. Iimvume ezinomngcipheko ophezulu ziyagqanyiswa.

deleteConfirm.title: Cima Indima
deleteConfirm.message: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukucima indima ethi "{{name}}"?
deleteConfirm.warning: Abasebenzisi {{count}} okwangoku banale ndima. Baza kulahlekelwa zizo zonke iimvume ezinxulumene nale ndima.

featureDisabled.title: Uphawu Aluvulwanga
featureDisabled.message: Iimvume ze-granular azikavulwa kwishishini lakho. Nxibelelana nomlawuli wakho ukuze uvumele olu phawu.

settings.universalDocsDescription: Le yimithetho yakho yokuthobela imithetho (Inqanaba lesi-2). Le migaqo isebenza KUYO YONKE imixholo oyivelisayo, eyeyakho neyenkampani. Faka izinto ozikhethayo, imiqathango, kunye nemithetho yesitayile apha.
settings.personalComplianceInfo: Le mithetho ijongiwe kuzo ZONKE iiprofayili zakho. Ukuze ufumane imithetho ethile yenkampani, yiya kwi-Enterprise Settings.
settings.reportsDescription: Khuphela iingxelo ezibanzi zovavanyo lomngcipheko kunye nohlalutyo lomxholo
settings.pdfReportDescription: Kubandakanya uvavanyo lomngcipheko, uhlalutyo lokuthobela imithetho, ukuqonda uvakalelo lwenkcubeko, kunye nohlalutyo lomxholo oluqhutywa yi-LLM
settings.riskAssessment: Uvavanyo loMngcipheko kunye noHlalutyo lokuThotyelwa kweMithetho
settings.dangerZoneDescription: Cima iakhawunti yakho ngonaphakade kunye nayo yonke idatha enxulumene nayo
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Wakuba uyicimile iakhawunti yakho, akukho kubuyela umva. Yonke idatha yakho kuquka izithuba, uhlalutyo, umxholo ocwangcisiweyo, kunye nezicwangciso ziya kususwa ngonaphakade.
settings.noHistoryFound: Akukho mbali ifunyenweyo. Qala ukuhlalutya umxholo ukuze ubone umsebenzi wakho apha.
settings.purchaseCreditsDesc: Thenga iikhredithi ezongezelelweyo okanye uphucule ubhaliso lwakho ukuze ufumane iikhredithi ezingaphezulu zenyanga.
settings.choosePlanDesc: Khetha isicwangciso esifanela iimfuno zakho. Iikhredithi ezingasetyenziswanga ziya kuqhubeka kwinyanga ezayo!
settings.extraCreditsDesc: Thenga ezinye iipakethi zetyala nangaliphi na ixesha. Ezi khredithi aziphelelwa lixesha kwaye ziyadlula inyanga nenyanga!
settings.creditsAddedInstantly: Iikhredithi zongezwa ngoko nangoko kwaye aziphelelwa lixesha. Ziya kuqhubeka kwinyanga ezayo!
settings.unusedCreditsRollover: Iikhredithi ezingasetyenziswanga ziya kudlula kwinyanga ezayo!

enterprise.title: Ideshibhodi yeShishini
enterprise.creator: Umdali
enterprise.createCompanyDesc: Yenza inkampani ukuze ivule iimpawu zeqela, iziseko zolwazi ezabelwana ngazo, kunye nemisebenzi yomxholo edibeneyo.
enterprise.becomeAdmin: Uza kuba nguMlawuli weNkampani olawula ngokupheleleyo.
enterprise.onlyAdminsCanManage: Kuphela ngabalawuli beNkampani abanokulawula ulwazi lwenkampani kunye nezicwangciso zeqela. Nxibelelana nomlawuli wakho ukuze ufumane utshintsho.
enterprise.createAsAdminNote: Njengomdali, uza kuba nguMlawuli weNkampani onemvume epheleleyo yokulawula iqela kunye nolwazi.
enterprise.knowledgeBaseDesc: Amaxwebhu afakwe apha asebenza kuwo onke amalungu eqela kuyo yonke imixholo yawo. Le mithetho ibaluleke kakhulu kwaye igqitha useto lomntu ngamnye lomsebenzisi kunye neprofayili.
enterprise.uploadCompanyDocsHint: Izikhokelo zebhrendi, imigaqo-nkqubo yezomthetho, amaxwebhu okuthobela imithetho, imigaqo-nkqubo yeendaba zoluntu
enterprise.noCompanyDocs: Akukho maxwebhu enkampani afakiweyo okwangoku. Qala ngokulayisha izikhokelo zophawu lwakho okanye amaxwebhu okuthobela imithetho.
enterprise.teamMembersDesc: Lawula amalungu eqela lakho kunye nemisebenzi yawo. Abalawuli banokulayisha amaxwebhu enkampani baze balawule iqela.
enterprise.leaveCompanyWarning: Shiya le nkampani. Ukuba nguwe wedwa umphathi, kufuneka unyuse elinye ilungu kuqala.
enterprise.loseAccessWarning: Uza kulahlekelwa lulwazi oluhlanganyelweyo lwenkampani kunye neempawu zeqela.
enterprise.adminLeaveWarning: Njengomlawuli, kufuneka unyuse elinye ilungu libe ngumlawuli ngaphambi kokuba uhambe.
enterprise.enterEmailAddress: Nceda ufake idilesi ye-imeyile yomntu ofuna ukummema.

dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi yeShishini
dashboard.scoreDescriptions: Ngokusekelwe kumanqaku ohlalutyo lwe-AI: Egqwesileyo (85-100), Elungileyo (75-84), Ephakathi (60-74), Embi (40-59), Ebalulekileyo (0-39)
dashboard.accessDeniedDesc: Abalawuli beshishini kuphela abanokufikelela kweli phepha

analytics.pageDescription: Iingcinga ezipheleleyo zeqonga kunye neemetrikhi (Ulawulo Kuphela)
analytics.scoreTrendsDesc: Ngokubanzi, ukulandelwa kwamanqaku kunye neNkcubeko (iinyanga ezi-6)
analytics.geographicDistributionDesc: Cofa kwiimaki ukuze ubone ulwahlulo lwabantu ngokwamazwe
analytics.costAnalysisDesc: Iindleko zokucubungula i-AI kunye nokulandelela uhlahlo-lwabiwo mali

cancel.title: Rhoxisa ubhaliso
cancel.subtitle: Siyaxolisa ukukubona uhamba
cancel.confirmCancel: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukurhoxisa ubhaliso lwakho?
cancel.keepBenefits: Uza kugcina ukufikelela kude kube sekupheleni kwexesha lakho lokuhlawula
cancel.accessUntil: Uza kuba nokufikelela kude kube ngu-{{date}}

errors.networkError: Impazamo yenethiwekhi. Nceda ujonge uqhagamshelo lwakho.
errors.validationError: Nceda ujonge igalelo lakho uze uzame kwakhona

scheduledPosts.pendingApprovalDesc: Izithuba ezithunyelwe ngamalungu eqela zilinde uphononongo lwakho.
scheduledPosts.approvedReadyDesc: Izithuba ezivunyiweyo zilungele ukucwangciswa okanye ukupapashwa.
scheduledPosts.scheduledPostsDesc: Izithuba zilungele ukupapashwa ngexesha lazo elicwangcisiweyo.
scheduledPosts.postsWillAppearHere: Izithuba ezicwangciselwe ukupapashwa ziza kuvela apha
scheduledPosts.autoPostToSocial: Thumela ngokuzenzekelayo kwimidiya yoluntu emva kwesizukulwana
scheduledPosts.rejectionPlaceholder: Nceda unikeze ingxelo eyakhayo echaza isizathu sokuba le posi ifuna ukuhlaziywa...
scheduledPosts.rejectionFeedbackNote: Le ngxelo iza kuthunyelwa kumdali ukuze amncede aphucule isithuba.

toasts.postReturnedDesc: Iposi ithunyelwe kumdali kunye nempendulo yakho.

scheduledPosts.confirmCancel: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukurhoxisa le posi icwangcisiweyo?
scheduledPosts.confirmDeletePrompt: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukucima esi sicelo sicwangcisiweyo?

allPosts.importTooltip: Ngenisa izithuba zembali ezivela kwiiakhawunti zakho zoluntu ezidityanisiweyo nge-Ayrshare
allPosts.connectSocialToView: Qhagamshela iiakhawunti zoluntu kwiSetingi ukuze uzibone
allPosts.createFirstPost: Yenza isithuba sakho sokuqala kwithebhu yokuVelisa umxholo!

toasts.resubmittedDesc: Umphathi wakho uza kujonga lo mxholo.
toasts.connectSocialAccountsDesc: Qhagamshela iiakhawunti zakho zemidiya yoluntu kwiSetingi ukuze uvumelanise iimetrikhi zokuzibandakanya.
toasts.connectSocialFirst: Nceda uqhagamshele iiakhawunti zakho zoluntu kuqala kwiSetingi > iiAkhawunti zoLuntu
toasts.ayrshareUpgradeRequired: I-Ayrshare Premium okanye iSicwangciso seShishini siyafuneka

allPosts.confirmReanalyze: Oku kuza kuhlaziya zonke izithuba zakho. Qhubeka?
allPosts.confirmDelete: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukucima le posi?

documentation.title: Uncedo kunye namaxwebhu
documentation.subtitle: Fumana izikhokelo kunye nezixhobo zokukunceda ufumane okuninzi kwi-Contentry. Khetha isikhokelo ngokusekelwe kwindima yakho.

whatsNew.title: Yintoni entsha
whatsNew.description: Uhlaziyo oluzifumane ngokuzenzekelayo kunye neempawu ezintsha ezongeziweyo kwiqonga
whatsNew.subtitle: Ufumene ngokuzenzekelayo utshintsho kunye nohlaziyo kwiqonga

adminGuide.title: Isikhokelo soLawulo
adminGuide.description: Isikhokelo esipheleleyo sabalawuli beqonga. Funda indlela yokulawula abasebenzisi, ukujonga uhlalutyo, kunye nokumisela useto lwenkqubo.

enterpriseGuide.title: Isikhokelo seShishini
enterpriseGuide.description: Isikhokelo sabalawuli benkampani. Funda ukulawula iqela lakho, ukuseta iziseko zolwazi, kunye nokusingatha ukuvunywa komxholo.

userGuide.title: Isikhokelo somsebenzisi
userGuide.description: Yonke into oyifunayo ukuze udale, uhlalutye, kwaye upapashe umxholo. Ifanelekile kubadali bomxholo kunye nabathengisi.

overview.intro: Njengomlawuli weqonga, unokufikelela kwizixhobo ezibanzi zokujonga nokulawula lonke iqonga le-Contentry. Esi sikhokelo siza kukunceda uqonde izakhono zakho zolawulo.
overview.dashboardDesc: I-Admin Dashboard inika umbono wezinto ezenzekayo kwiqonga kunye nempilo.
overview.feature1: Ukubeka esweni imisebenzi yomsebenzisi ngexesha langempela
overview.tip: Ndwendwela i-Admin Dashboard rhoqo ukuze uhlale unolwazi malunga neendlela ezisetyenziswa kwiqonga kwaye uchonge iingxaki ezinokubakho kwangethuba.

userManagement.intro: Ulawulo lwabasebenzisi ngumsebenzi oyintloko wolawulo okuvumela ukuba wongamele bonke abasebenzisi kunye namashishini akwiqonga.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Fikelela kwicandelo loLawulo lwaBasebenzisi ukuze ubone, ukhangele, kwaye ulawule bonke abasebenzisi beqonga.
userManagement.feature1: Khangela kwaye uhluze abasebenzisi ngegama, i-imeyile, okanye indima
userManagement.feature2: Jonga iiprofayili zomsebenzisi ezineenkcukacha kunye nembali yomsebenzi
userManagement.feature4: Vala okanye ucime iiakhawunti zomsebenzisi xa kuyimfuneko
userManagement.role1: Ulawulo: Ukufikelela ngokupheleleyo kwiqonga elinamandla okumisela inkqubo
userManagement.role2: Ulawulo lweShishini: Ulawula iqela lenkampani yakhe kunye nezicwangciso
userManagement.role3: Umsebenzisi: Iimpawu eziqhelekileyo zokudalwa komxholo kunye nohlalutyo
userManagement.warning: Soloko uqinisekisa impembelelo ngaphambi kokuba utshintshe iindima zomsebenzisi okanye ucime iiakhawunti. Ezi zenzo zinokuchaphazela imisebenzi yeqela.

analytics.intro: Uhlalutyo lubonelela ngolwazi olunzulu malunga nendlela esetyenziswa ngayo iqonga kuzo zonke iinkampani kunye nabasebenzisi.
analytics.metric5: Ukuthobela imithetho kunye namanqaku omngcipheko kumashishini onke
analytics.tip: Thumela iingxelo zohlalutyo kwiintetho zabachaphazelekayo usebenzisa uphawu lweNgxelo yoKhuphela.

financials.intro: Icandelo le-Financial Overview libonelela ngokubonakala kwemilinganiselo yengeniso yeqonga kunye nobhaliso.
financials.revenueDesc: Jonga imeko yezemali kunye neendlela zokubhalisa kuzo zonke iinkampani.

systemConfig.intro: Uqwalaselo lwenkqubo lukuvumela ukuba ulawule useto kunye nokuhlanganiswa kweqonga lonke.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Lungiselela kwaye ujonge ukuhlanganiswa komntu wesithathu:
systemConfig.integration2: Iinkonzo ze-AI zokuvelisa umxholo kunye nohlalutyo
systemConfig.tip: Soloko uvavanya ukuhlanganiswa kwindawo yokucwangcisa ngaphambi kokuba wenze utshintsho kwizicwangciso zemveliso.

gettingStarted.intro: Wamkelekile kwiContentry! NjengoMlawuli weShishini, unezixhobo zokulawula iqela lakho, ukumisela izikhokelo zomxholo, kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuhambelana kophawu.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Landela la manyathelo ukuze usete iakhawunti yakho yeshishini:
gettingStarted.step1: Zulazula uye kwiSetingi > Ishishini ukuze ufikelele kwideshibhodi yenkampani yakho
gettingStarted.step2: Faka izikhokelo kunye nemigaqo-nkqubo yophawu lwenkampani yakho kwi-Knowledge Base
gettingStarted.step3: Mema amalungu eqela lakho kwaye unike imisebenzi efanelekileyo
gettingStarted.step4: Lungiselela iindlela zokusebenza zokuvunywa kokuhlolwa komxholo
gettingStarted.tip: Gqibezela useto lwakho lweKnowledge Base ngaphambi kokumema amalungu eqela ukuqinisekisa ukuba banokufikelela kwizikhokelo zebhrendi ukususela ngosuku lokuqala.

teamManagement.intro: Ulawulo lweqela olusebenzayo luqinisekisa intsebenziswano egudileyo kunye nolawulo olufanelekileyo lokufikelela ngaphakathi kumbutho wakho.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Yongeza amalungu amatsha kwiqela lakho leshishini:
teamManagement.feature2: Khetha indima yabo (uMdali, uMphathi, okanye uMlawuli)
teamManagement.role1: Umdali: Unokwenza aze angenise umxholo ukuze uvunywe
teamManagement.role2: Umphathi: Uyakwazi ukuvuma/ukwala umxholo aze alawule abadali
teamManagement.role3: Ulawulo: Ukufikelela ngokupheleleyo kwishishini kuquka ukuhlawulisa kunye nezicwangciso
teamManagement.tip: Izimemo ziphelelwa lixesha emva kweentsuku ezisi-7. Khumbuza amalungu eqela ukuba azamkele izimemo zawo ngokukhawuleza.

knowledgeBase.intro: I-Knowledge Base yindawo ephambili yokugcina izikhokelo zebhrendi, imigaqo-nkqubo, kunye nemithetho yomxholo wenkampani yakho. Amaxwebhu afakwe apha azisa umxholo owenziwe yi-AI kuwo onke amalungu eqela.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Yongeza amaxwebhu aza kukhokela ekudalweni komxholo:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Izikhokelo zesitayile sebhrendi kunye nezikhokelo zelizwi
knowledgeBase.tip: Faka izikhokelo zakho ezibalulekileyo zebhrendi kuqala. I-AI ibeka phambili amaxwebhu kwi-Knowledge Base yenkampani ngaphezu kokulayisha umsebenzisi ngamnye.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Inkqubo yokuvuma iqinisekisa ukuba yonke into equlethweyo iyahlangabezana nemigangatho yenkampani yakho ngaphambi kokuba ipapashwe.
approvalWorkflow.warning: Nika amandla iimfuno zokuvunywa kwiSetingi ukuqinisekisa ukuba yonke into equlethweyo ihlaziywa ngaphambi kokuba ipapashwe.

billing.intro: Lawula ubhaliso lweshishini lakho kwaye ujonge ukusetyenziswa kwekhredithi.
billing.feature1: Iinkcukacha zesicwangciso sangoku kunye nokwabiwa kwekhredithi

adminUsersPage.title: Ulawulo lwaBasebenzisi
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Lawula abasebenzisi beqonga lonke
adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukumcima lo msebenzisi?

deleteModal.title: Cima Umsebenzisi
deleteModal.description: Oku kuya kususa umsebenzisi unaphakade kunye nayo yonke idatha enxulumene noko:

gettingStarted.intro: Wamkelekile kwiContentry! Esi sikhokelo siza kukunceda udale umxholo onomtsalane nohambelanayo usebenzisa izixhobo ezisebenzisa i-AI.
gettingStarted.step3: Yenza iProfayili yeSicwangciso-qhinga sebhrendi okanye iphulo lakho
gettingStarted.tip: Qala ngeProfayili yeSicwangciso ukuqinisekisa ukuba yonke into oyithethayo igcina ithoni kunye nemiyalezo efanayo.

contentCreation.intro: Ukuveliswa komxholo oqhutywa yi-AI kaContentry kukunceda udale izithuba ezinomdla ngemizuzwana.
contentCreation.feature1: Faka isihloko okanye umyalezo ochaza into ofuna ukuposa ngayo
contentCreation.feature2: Khetha amaqonga akho ekujoliswe kuwo (iLinkedIn, iTwitter, iFacebook, njl.njl.)
contentCreation.schedule2: Khetha iintsuku ezithile kunye namaxesha okuthumela ngokuzenzekelayo
contentCreation.schedule3: Vumela ukuthumela ngokuzenzekelayo okanye uphononongo olwenziwe ngesandla ngaphambi kokupapasha
contentCreation.tip: Sebenzisa ibhokisi ethi 'Umxholo Wokukhuthazwa' xa usenza izithuba zokuthengisa ukuqinisekisa ukuba uhlalutyo lokuthobela imithetho luqwalasela izikhokelo zokukhuthaza.

analyzeContent.intro: Isici se-Analyse Content sihlola umxholo wakho ukuze sibone ukuba uyahambelana na nemithetho, ukuba inkcubeko ibalulekile na, kunye nokuhambelana kweempawu.
analyzeContent.step4: Cofa uHlalutya ukuze ufumane impendulo eneenkcukacha
analyzeContent.tip: Soloko uhlalutya umxholo ngaphambi kokuba uwupapashe kumaqonga angaphandle, ingakumbi kumaphulo ajolise kwimimandla emininzi.

strategicProfiles.intro: IiProfayili zoBuchule zichaza umxholo, ithoni, kunye nezikhokelo zokudalwa kunye nohlalutyo lomxholo.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Chaza abaphulaphuli ekujoliswe kubo kwiprofayili kunye nenjongo yayo
strategicProfiles.feature3: Layisha amaxwebhu kunye nezikhokelo ezithile zeprofayili
strategicProfiles.feature4: Lungiselela ithoni emiselweyo kunye nokukhethwa kwesitayile
strategicProfiles.tip: Yenza iiProfayili ezahlukeneyo zeqhinga leephulo ezahlukeneyo, iimpawu, okanye iimarike zengingqi.

socialAccounts.intro: Qhagamshela iiakhawunti zakho zeendaba zoluntu ukuze upapashe umxholo ngqo kwi-Contentry.
socialAccounts.warning: Gcina unxibelelwano lwakho lweakhawunti yoluntu luhlaziyiwe. Iithokheni eziphelelwe lixesha zinokuthintela ukupapashwa kwezithuba ezicwangcisiweyo.

approvalProcess.intro: Ukuba ishishini lakho livunyiwe ukuba lisebenzise iindlela zokusebenza, umxholo kufuneka uhlolwe ngaphambi kokuba upapashwe.
approvalProcess.step2: Cofa u-'Thumela ukuze uVunyelwe' ukuze uthumele kumphathi wakho
approvalProcess.step3: Landelela imeko yemvume kumgca wokuVunywa okuLindiweyo
approvalProcess.tip: Yongeza amanqaku xa uthumela umxholo ukuze unike abahlalutyi umxholo malunga nezigqibo zakho zobuchule.

aboutGuide.title: Malunga Neendlela Ezilungileyo Zokusebenza
aboutGuide.description: Funda ukuba yintoni injongo yoMxholo kwaye ufumane iindlela ezilungileyo zokuphucula ukudalwa komxholo wakho, izivumelwano zebhrendi, kunye neeprofayili zabantu abanempembelelo.

whatIsContentry.intro: I-Contentry liqonga lobukrelekrele bomxholo eliqhutywa yi-AI elenzelwe ukunceda abadali bomxholo, abathengisi, kunye namashishini ukuba benze, bahlalutye, kwaye bapapashe umxholo ohambelanayo ngomlinganiselo. Nokuba ungumntu onefuthe okanye uyinxalenye yeqela elikhulu lokuthengisa, i-Contentry yenza kube lula ukuhamba komsebenzi wakho womxholo.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Sikholelwa ekunikeni amandla abadali ngezixhobo ezikrelekrele eziqinisekisa ukuba yonke into equlethweyo ikwibhrendi, ithathela ingqalelo inkcubeko, kwaye ihambelana nezikhokelo zeqonga.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Ukuveliswa komxholo oqhutywa yi-AI ohambelana nelizwi lophawu lwakho
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Iindlela zokusebenza ezilungelelanisiweyo zokuvunywa kwamaqela eshishini
whatIsContentry.tip: Umxholo udibanisa amandla e-AI kunye nolawulo lomntu ukuze kunikelwe umxholo ohambelana nabaphulaphuli bakho ngelixa uhlala uthobela.

keyFeatures.intro: I-Contentry ibonelela ngezixhobo ezininzi zokulawula lonke ixesha lakho lomxholo:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Yenza umxholo osemgangathweni ophezulu olungiselelwe uphawu lwakho kunye nabaphulaphuli bakho:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Ukuveliswa komxholo okwenziwa ngamaqonga amaninzi (iLinkedIn, iTwitter, iFacebook, iInstagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Iithoni zokubhala ezinokwenziwa ngokwezifiso (Zobuchwephesha, Eziqhelekileyo, Ezikhuthazayo)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Ukuveliswa kwemifanekiso ye-AI ehamba nezithuba zakho
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Qinisekisa ukuba umxholo wakho uhlangabezana nazo zonke iimfuno ngaphambi kokuba ushicilele:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Ukujonga ukuthobela imithetho ngokuzenzekelayo ngokuchasene nemigaqo-nkqubo yenkampani
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Amanqaku okuqonda inkcubeko kubaphulaphuli bamazwe ngamazwe
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Uvavanyo lomngcipheko kunye neengcebiso ezinokuthi zisebenze
keyFeatures.tip: Sebenzisa iiProfayili zoBuchule ukuqinisekisa ukuba igama lophawu lihlala lihleli kuzo zonke izinto eziveliswayo.

bestPractices.intro: Ukulandela ezi ndlela zibalaseleyo kuya kukunceda ufumane okuninzi kwi-Contentry kwaye wenze umxholo osebenza kakuhle:
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Ukuhamba komsebenzi okuqhubekekayo kuqinisekisa umgangatho nokusebenza kakuhle:
bestPractices.workflow1: Qala ngokuseta iProfayili yakho yeSicwangciso ngezikhokelo zebhrendi
bestPractices.workflow2: Yenza umxholo ucinge ngeqonga elithile kunye nabaphulaphuli
bestPractices.workflow3: Soloko uhlalutya umxholo ngaphambi kokuba uwupapashe kumaqonga angaphandle
bestPractices.workflow4: Sebenzisa iimpawu zokucwangcisa ukugcina isantya sokuthumela esihambelanayo
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Ukwakha uphawu oluhlala luhleli kwakha ukuthembana nokwaziwa:
bestPractices.consistency1: Layisha isikhokelo sesitayile sakho sophawu kwi-Knowledge Base
bestPractices.consistency2: Sebenzisa iProfayili yoBuchule efanayo kwiiphulo ezinxulumene noko
bestPractices.consistency3: Hlola umxholo owenziwe yi-AI ukuqinisekisa ukuba uhambelana nelizwi lakho
bestPractices.warning: Soloko uhlola umxholo owenziwe yi-AI ngaphambi kokuba upapashe. Nangona i-AI yethu inamandla, ukujongwa ngabantu kuqinisekisa iziphumo ezilungileyo.

optimizeContent.intro: Ukudala umxholo omhle sisiqalo nje. Nantsi indlela yokuphucula ukuze ubandakanyeke kakhulu:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Iqonga ngalinye lineemfuno ezizodwa kunye nolindelo lwabaphulaphuli:
optimizeContent.platform1: I-LinkedIn: Gxila kwiingcamango zobungcali, sebenzisa amagama angundoqo kushishino, yamkeleke ixesha elide
optimizeContent.platform2: I-Twitter/X: Imiyalezo emfutshane, sebenzisa ii-hashtag ngobuchule, nxibelelana nezihloko ezithandwayo
optimizeContent.platform3: I-Facebook: Umxholo obonakalayo usebenza kakuhle, ukhuthaza ukubandakanyeka koluntu
optimizeContent.platform4: I-Instagram: Imifanekiso esemgangathweni ophezulu ibalulekile, sebenzisa ii-hashtag ezifanelekileyo, Amabali okuzibandakanya
optimizeContent.engagement1: Thumela rhoqo ngamaxesha afanelekileyo kubaphulaphuli bakho
optimizeContent.engagement2: Sebenzisa ubizo olunyanzelisayo lokwenza okuthile kumxholo wakho
optimizeContent.engagement3: Phendula kwizimvo kwaye unxibelelane noluntu lwakho
optimizeContent.engagement4: Landela uhlalutyo ukuze uqonde ukuba loluphi umxholo osebenza kakuhle
optimizeContent.tip: Sebenzisa uphawu lweshedyuli yeContentry ukuze uthumele ngexesha elifanelekileyo ngaphandle komzamo owenziwa ngesandla.

brandDeals.intro: Ubudlelwane phakathi kwebhrendi bunokuba ngumjelo omkhulu wengeniso. Nantsi indlela yokuphucula indlela osebenza ngayo:
brandDeals.prep2: Landelela kwaye ubonise iindlela zakho zokuzibandakanya
brandDeals.prep3: Yakha ikhithi yemidiya ngeenkcukacha zabantu bakho kunye nokufikelela kwabo
brandDeals.prep4: Sebenzisa i-Contentry ukuvelisa imizekelo yeengcamango zomxholo onophawu
brandDeals.pitch1: Lungelelanisa intetho yakho nexabiso lophawu kunye nabaphulaphuli ekujoliswe kubo
brandDeals.pitch2: Nika izimvo ezithile zomxholo endaweni yezindululo eziqhelekileyo
brandDeals.pitch3: Faka uhlalutyo lokuthobela imithetho ukubonisa ukuba umxholo wakho uyahlangabezana nezikhokelo
brandDeals.tip: Sebenzisa ukujonga ukuthobela imithetho yeContentry xa udala umxholo oxhaswayo ukuqinisekisa ukuba iimfuno ze-FTC kunye nokutyhilwa kweqonga ziyafezekiswa.

influencerProfiles.intro: Iprofayili yakho yeqhinga sisiseko sesicwangciso sakho somxholo. Nantsi indlela yokuyenza ngcono:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Iprofayili elungiselelwe kakuhle iqinisekisa umxholo ohambelanayo, okwibhrendi:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Chaza ngokucacileyo i-niche yakho kunye nabaphulaphuli ekujoliswe kubo
influencerProfiles.setup2: Seta ithoni kunye nesitayile sokubhala osithandayo
influencerProfiles.setup3: Yongeza izinto eziqwalaselwe ngokwenkcubeko nangokwengingqi kubaphulaphuli bakho
influencerProfiles.setup4: Layisha amaxwebhu esalathiso achaza igama lophawu lwakho
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Qhubeka uphucula iprofayili yakho ukuze ufumane iziphumo ezingcono:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Hlola umxholo owenziweyo kwaye ulungise useto lweprofayili njengoko kufuneka
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Yenza iiprofayili ezininzi zeephulo okanye abaphulaphuli abahlukeneyo
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Gcina isiseko sakho solwazi sihlaziyiwe ngezikhokelo zamva nje zebhrendi
influencerProfiles.tip: Hlaziya iProfayili yakho yeSicwangciso rhoqo ngekota ukuqinisekisa ukuba ibonakalisa uphawu lwakho olutshintshayo kunye nabaphulaphuli bakho.

workflowsGuide.title: Isikhokelo sokuSebenza kunye nokuNika amanqaku
workflowsGuide.description: Funda indlela esebenza ngayo inkqubo yokufumana amanqaku kwaye uqonde inyathelo ngalinye lomsebenzi ukusuka kuhlalutyo lomxholo ukuya ekuvunyweni.

scoring.intro: Inkqubo yokufumana amanqaku kwiContentry inika amanqaku acacileyo, asekelwe kwisohlwayo ukukunceda uqonde indlela umxholo wakho osebenza ngayo. Onke amanqaku aqala kwi-100 kwaye amanqaku ayancitshiswa ngenxa yokwaphulwa kwemithetho ethile okanye imiba efunyenweyo.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Amanqaku apheleleyo yindibaniselwano elinganisiweyo yazo zonke izinto zohlalutyo, ukusuka kwi-0 ukuya kwi-100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Igqwesile - Ilungele ukupapashwa, umxholo uphuculwe kakhulu
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Kulungile - Uphuculo oluncinci luyacetyiswa ngaphambi kokushicilelwa
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Ifuna Ingqwalasela - Kufuneka uphononongo kunye nohlaziyo
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Iphawulwe - Imiba ebalulekileyo, musa ukuyipapasha ide isonjululwe
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Amanqaku apheleleyo asebenzisa ukulinganisa okuguquguqukayo ngokusekelwe kwinqanaba lomngcipheko:
scoring.overallCalc4: Umngcipheko Obalulekileyo (Ukuthobela 40): Amanqaku apheleleyo aqiniswe kakhulu kwi-40 ephezulu
scoring.componentsDesc: Amanqaku akho ewonke abalwa kwiinkalo ezintathu eziphambili kusetyenziswa inkqubo esekelwe kwisohlwayo:
scoring.component1: Amanqaku okuthobela umthetho: Aqala kwi-100, asusa amanqaku ngolwaphulo-mthetho olufunyenweyo
scoring.component2: Amanqaku oBuchule beNkcubeko: Umyinge wemilinganiselo emi-6 yenkcubeko kaHofstede
scoring.component3: Amanqaku okuChaneka: Aqala kwi-100, asusa amanqaku ngokuchaneka okanye ingxaki nganye efunyenweyo
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Isithuba ngasinye siqala ngamanqaku okuthobela imithetho ali-100. Amanqaku ayancitshiswa ngolwaphulo-mthetho ngalunye:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Ukwaphulwa komthetho okubalulekileyo (-60 pts): ukwaphulwa kwe-NDA, ukutyhilwa kolwazi oluyimfihlo  Umngcipheko wokupheliswa kwangoko
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Ukwaphulwa komthetho okuqatha (-40 pts): Ukuxhatshazwa, ucalucalulo, intetho yentiyo  Umngcipheko wesenzo somthetho
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Ukwaphulwa komthetho okuphezulu (-25 pts): Ukungatyhileki kwentengiso, ukwaphulwa komgaqo-nkqubo  Isohlwayo/umngcipheko wokunqunyanyiswa
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Ukwaphulwa komthetho okuphakathi (-10 pts): Ithoni engafanelekanga, ukuphambuka okuncinci kwesikhokelo  Uqeqesho/isilumkiso
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Umzekelo: Akukho #ad (-25) + Ingxaki yethoni (-10) = Amanqaku okugqibela angama-65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: I-stack yokwaphulwa kwemithetho emininzi - isohlwayo ngasinye sisetyenziswa ngokudibeneyo
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Ukwaphulwa kwemithetho okujongiweyo: Ulwazi oluyimfihlo, Ukuxhatshazwa, ukwaphulwa kwe-NDA, Ukungatyhileki kakuhle, Ukwaphulwa kwemigaqo-nkqubo, Ithoni engafanelekanga
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Amanqaku enkcubeko aphakathi kwemilinganiselo emithandathu esemthethweni yenkcubeko yeHofstede (0-100 nganye):
scoring.culturalDim1: Umgama wamandla: Ukuthobela umthetho, intlonipho yegunya ngokuchasene nokulingana, ithoni engacwangciswanga
scoring.culturalDim2: Ukuzimela komntu ngamnye vs. Ukuqokelelana kwabantu: Ukugxila 'Mna/Mna' vs. Ukugxila 'Thina/Nathi' kuluntu
scoring.culturalDim3: Ubudoda vs. Ubufazi: Ulwimi olukhuphisanayo/oluzingcayo vs. olusebenzisanayo/oluvumelanayo
scoring.culturalDim4: Ukuphepha Ukungaqiniseki: Imithetho, ukhuseleko, ugxininiso lokucaca ngokuchasene nokuvuleleka kokungacaci
scoring.culturalDim5: Uqhelaniso Lwexesha Elide: Ingqwalasela yemivuzo yexesha elizayo xa kuthelekiswa nenzuzo yexesha elifutshane
scoring.culturalDim6: Ukuzonwabisa ngokuchasene nokuzibamba: Ulwimi oluthembayo/ulonwabo ngokuchasene nolwimi oluzibophelelayo/olulawulwayo
scoring.culturalRisk: Xa iCultural Score isihla ngaphantsi kwama-50, kusetyenziswa umlinganiselo 'woMngcipheko woDumo' ukukhusela uphawu lwakho kubaphulaphuli behlabathi liphela.
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Isithuba ngasinye siqala nge-Accuracy Score eyi-100. Amanqaku ayancitshiswa kwiingxaki ezifunyenweyo:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Ukungachaneki Okukhulu/Ulwazi Olungeyonyani (-40 pts): Amabango obuxoki, idatha engeyonyani
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Umthombo Ongathembekanga (-20 pts): Amabango avela kwimithombo engathembekanga
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Umzekelo: Ibango lobuxoki (-40) + Umthombo ongaqinisekiswanga (-20) = Amanqaku okugqibela angama-40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Imiba emininzi iqokelelwe - isohlwayo ngasinye sisetyenziswa ngokudibeneyo
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Umxholo ubekwa uphawu ngokuzenzekelayo ngokusekelwe kwiziphumo zohlalutyo:
scoring.flag1: Ukusasazwa Okulungileyo (Okuluhlaza): Amanqaku angaphezu kwama-80 - alungele ukupapashwa
scoring.flag2: Ifuna Ingqwalasela (Etyheli): Amanqaku angama-60-79 - kucetyiswa ukuphuculwa okuncinci
scoring.flag3: Iphawulwe ukuze ihlolwe (iOrenji): Amanqaku angama-40-59 - kufuneka uphononongo ngaphambi kokushicilelwa
scoring.flag4: Imiba Ebalulekileyo (Ebomvu): Amanqaku angaphantsi kwama-40 - musa ukuwapapasha de asombululwe
scoring.disclosure1: Ikhuthaza: Ifumanisa ukuba umxholo uyabhengeza okanye uyaxhaswa
scoring.disclosure2: UneSityhilelo: Uhlola #intengiso, #inkxaso, okanye isityhilelo esifanelekileyo sentsebenziswano
scoring.disclosure3: Ukuthobela iMithetho yeSithili: Kuqinisekisa iimfuno zokubhengeza ze-FTC (US), EU, kunye neNorway
scoring.disclosure4: Ukungatyhileki kakuhle kubangela ukwaphulwa komthetho okuphezulu (amanqaku angama-25) kwiNqaku lokuthobela imithetho
scoring.tip: Amanqaku abalwa kwakhona ngalo lonke ixesha umxholo uhlalutywa. Sebenzisa uphawu lokubhala ngokutsha ukuphucula ngokuzenzekelayo umxholo ongenamanqaku aphantsi ngelixa ugcina umyalezo wakho.

analyze.intro: Umsebenzi we-Analyse Content ukukunceda uvavanye umxholo okhoyo ukuze ubone ukuba uyahambelana na nemigaqo, ukuba unomdla kwinkcubeko, kunye nomgangatho ngaphambi kokuba upapashe.
analyze.stepsDesc: Landela la manyathelo ukuze uhlalutye umxholo wakho:
analyze.step1: Zulazulela kwi-Content Intelligence > Hlalutya ithebhu yoMxholo
analyze.step2: Ncamathisela okanye uthayiphe umxholo wakho kwindawo yombhalo
analyze.step3: Khetha iProfayili yeSicwangciso ukuze usebenzise izikhokelo zophawu lwakho
analyze.step4: Jonga ngokuzithandela 'Yenza umfanekiso ohamba nawo' ukuba ufuna i-AI yenze umfanekiso obonakalayo
analyze.step5: Cofa u-'Hlalutya' ukuze uqhube uhlalutyo olupheleleyo
analyze.type1: Ukuhlolwa kokuthobela imithetho: Uqinisekisa umxholo ngokuchasene nemigaqo-nkqubo kunye nemigaqo yeqonga (i-FTC, i-GDPR)
analyze.type2: Uvakalelo lweNkcubeko: Iskena umxholo onokuba yinto ekhubekisayo okanye engathandekiyo ngokwenkcubeko
analyze.type3: Ukuqinisekiswa Kokuchaneka: Kujonga amabango kunye neenyaniso ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuchaneka kwawo
analyze.type4: Ulungelelwaniso lweBrand: Thelekisa umxholo kunye nezikhokelo zakho zeProfayili yoBuchule
analyze.tip: Sebenzisa iqhosha elithi 'Bhala kwakhona' ukuphucula ngokuzenzekelayo umxholo ofumana amanqaku angaphantsi kwama-70. I-AI iya kujongana nemiba ephawulweyo ngelixa igcina umyalezo wakho.

generate.intro: Umsebenzi we-Generate Content usebenzisa i-AI ukudala umxholo omtsha ngokusekelwe kwisihloko sakho, iimfuno zeqonga, kunye nezikhokelo zebhrendi.
generate.step1: Zulazulela kwi-Content Intelligence > ithebhu yokuVeliswa koMxholo
generate.step2: Faka isihloko sakho okanye uchaze into ofuna ukuyidala
generate.step3: Khetha iqonga (amaqonga) ojolise kulo kunye nethoni yokubhala
generate.step4: Khetha iProfayili yeSicwangciso ukuze uphawu lwakho luhlale lufana
generate.step5: Cofa 'Yenza' ukuze udale umxholo osebenza nge-AI
generate.optionsDesc: Yenza ngokwezifiso umxholo wakho owenziweyo ngezi ndlela zilandelayo:
generate.option1: Ukukhetha iQonga: Khetha iqonga elinye okanye amaninzi (iLinkedIn, iTwitter, iFacebook, iInstagram)
generate.option2: Ithoni yokubhala: Khetha kwiNgcali, engaqhelekanga, ekhuthazayo, okanye enolwazi
generate.option3: Ubude boMxholo: Lungisa ubude obujoliswe kubo bomxholo wakho
generate.option4: Ukuveliswa komfanekiso: Vula ukuze wenze umfanekiso oveliswe yi-AI ohamba nawo
generate.tip: Umxholo ovelisiweyo uhlalutywa ngokuzenzekelayo emva kokudalwa. Hlaziya amanqaku kwaye usebenzise amaqhosha okuphendula ukuze uphinde uvelise kwakhona ukuba kuyimfuneko.

schedulePrompt.intro: Ishedyuli yoLungiso ikuvumela ukuba usete ukuveliswa komxholo ngokuzenzekelayo okusebenza ngamaxesha athile, ugcine ikhalenda yakho yomxholo igcwele ngaphandle kokungenelela ngesandla.
schedulePrompt.step1: Yenza isindululo sakho sokuvelisa umxholo ngesihloko kunye nezinto ozikhethayo
schedulePrompt.step2: Misela ishedyuli rhoqo (imihla ngemihla, iveki, okanye iintsuku ezithile)
schedulePrompt.step3: Khetha ixesha apho umxholo kufuneka wenziwe khona
schedulePrompt.step4: Nika amandla 'uhlalutyo oluzenzekelayo' ukuze kuqhutywe uhlalutyo kumxholo owenziweyo ngokuzenzekelayo
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Gcina uthumela imiyalezo rhoqo ngaphandle komsebenzi wesandla wemihla ngemihla
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Yakha umxholo osemva ukuze uhlolwe kwaye uvunywe
schedulePrompt.tip: Izindululo ezicwangcisiweyo zivelisa umxholo kwiidrafti zakho. Hlola kwaye uvume ngaphambi kokuba upapashe ukuqinisekisa umgangatho.

schedulePost.intro: Ishedyuli yePosi ikuvumela ukuba ubeke umxholo ovunyiweyo ukuze upapashwe ngokuzenzekelayo ngamaxesha afanelekileyo kumaqonga akho eendaba zoluntu axhunyiweyo.
schedulePost.step1: Ukusuka kuyo nayiphi na imbonakalo yomxholo, cofa u-'Shedyuli' endaweni yokuthi 'Shicilela Ngoku'
schedulePost.step2: Khetha umhla nexesha olijolise kulo lokupapasha
schedulePost.step3: Khetha ukuba zeziphi iiplatifomu zoluntu eziqhagamshelweyo oza kuzipapasha
schedulePost.step4: Qinisekisa kwaye wongeze kumgca wakho ocwangcisiweyo
schedulePost.option1: Ixesha Elithile: Khetha umhla ochanekileyo kunye nexesha lokupapasha
schedulePost.option2: Ixesha Elilungileyo: Vumela i-AI icebise amaxesha afanelekileyo okuthumela ngokusekelwe kwidatha yokubandakanyeka
schedulePost.option3: Iiplatifomu ezininzi: Hlela umxholo ofanayo kumaqonga amaninzi ngaxeshanye
schedulePost.warning: Izithuba ezicwangcisiweyo zifuna ubuncinane iakhawunti enye yemidiya yoluntu eqhagamshelweyo. Qhagamshela iiakhawunti kwiSetingi > Iiprofayili zoLuntu.

approval.intro: Indlela Yokusebenza Yokuvunywa iqinisekisa umgangatho womxholo ngokufuna uphononongo lomphathi ngaphambi kokuba upapashe. Oku kubaluleke kakhulu kumaqela eenkampani kunye namashishini alawulwayo.
approval.processDesc: Indlela umxholo ohamba ngayo kumsebenzi wokuvuma:
approval.step1: Umdali uthumela umxholo ngokucofa 'Ngenisa ukuze uvunywe'
approval.step3: Umphathi uhlola umxholo, amanqaku, kunye neziphumo zohlalutyo
approval.step4: Umphathi uyayivuma, acele utshintsho, okanye uyayigatya into equlethweyo
approval.status2: Imvume Esalindileyo: Ingenisiwe kwaye ilinde uphononongo lomphathi
approval.status4: Uhlaziyo lweeMfuno: Umphathi ucele utshintsho - jonga impendulo uze ungenise kwakhona
approval.tip: Yongeza amanqaku xa uthumela umxholo ukuze unike abahloli umxholo malunga nezigqibo zakho zobuchule. Oku kuyakhawulezisa inkqubo yokuvunywa.

confirmDelete.title: Qinisekisa ukucima
confirmDelete.userMessage: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukumcima lo msebenzisi? Esi senzo asinakurhoxiswa.
confirmDelete.bulkMessage: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukucima abasebenzisi be-{{count}}? Esi senzo asinakurhoxiswa.

confirmCancelSubscription.title: Rhoxisa ubhaliso
confirmCancelSubscription.message: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukurhoxisa ubhaliso lwalo msebenzisi? Baza kulahlekelwa kukufikelela kwiimpawu zeprimiyamu.

twoFactorAuth.title: Ukuqinisekiswa kwezinto ezimbini
twoFactorAuth.description: Yongeza umaleko ongezelelweyo wokhuseleko kwiakhawunti yakho
twoFactorAuth.setupInstructions: Skena le khowudi ye-QR nge-app yakho yokuqinisekisa
twoFactorAuth.backupCodesDescription: Gcina ezi khowudi kwindawo ekhuselekileyo. Ungazisebenzisa ukufikelela kwiakhawunti yakho ukuba ulahlekelwa yi-authenticator yakho.

platformSelector.title: Amaqonga ekujoliswe kuwo
platformSelector.aiWillOptimize: I-AI iza kuphucula umxholo weqonga le-{{count}}
platformSelector.aiWillOptimizePlural: I-AI iza kuphucula umxholo wamaqonga e-{{count}}

postsTable.title: Zonke izithuba
postsTable.description: Lawula kwaye uhlole zonke izithuba zakho

emptyState.createFirst: Yenza iposti yakho yokuqala ukuze uqalise

gdpr.cookieDescription: Sisebenzisa iikuki ukuphucula amava akho okuphequlula, sikhonze umxholo olungiselelwe wena, kwaye sihlalutye ithrafikhi yethu. Ngokucofa u-"Yamkela Konke", uyavuma ukuba sisebenzise iikuki. Ungazilungiselela ngokwezifiso izinto ozikhethayo okanye ungazamkeli iikuki ezingabalulekanga.
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Iyimfuneko ekuqinisekiseni ubunyani, ukhuseleko, kunye nokusebenza okusisiseko. Ayinakucinywa.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Sincede siqonde indlela iindwendwe ezisebenzisana ngayo neqonga lethu ukuphucula iinkonzo zethu.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Isetyenziselwa ukuhambisa iintengiso ezenzelwe wena kunye nokulinganisa ukusebenza kakuhle kwephulo.
